Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item holds immense value to us, and we believe it could significantly benefit you as well. After careful consideration, we propose an offer of $1,200,000 for the product. We are confident this price reflects its true worth and offers a fair deal for both parties. Should you have any questions or wish to discuss further, please don't hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working together. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,200,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,200,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
